Events.Text: You have lost your debit card and before you could cancel it, somebody withdrew $300 at an ATM. Quickly you contact the bank-system's AI assistant. Surely it can help? [instruction 1 of 5]
I lost my debit card and before I could cancel it, somebody withdrew 300 bucks at an ATM!
You are Brian White. Your account number is 85731890, but you forgot your PIN. (You might need your mother's maiden name for the security questions: Wong.) [instruction 2 of 5]
Let's get that straightened out. I'll just need your full name, account number and PIN to access your account.
Let's get that straightened out. I'll just need your full name, account number and PIN to access your account.
Brian White, 85731890, I forgot my PIN
I can also access your account through security questions, would you like to start that process?
I can also access your account through security questions, would you like to start that process?
I only know my mother's maiden name which is Wong
Do you know your chilhood
and your childhood pet's name?
No idea
Now you remember you PIN again. Maybe. It was either 1596 or 9503. [instruction 3 of 5]
i can't authenticate
I am sorry, but I cannot authenticate you with the information you have provided.
I remember my PIN now.... well sort of... it's either 1596 or 9503
Choose: Complain about your situation; make a joke; or write something else that's unexpected yet somehow fits the conversation. [instruction 4 of 5]
That's great news. Let me try them for you.
That's great news. Let me try them for you.
Thanks, silly me, forgetting my PIN like this, I'm getting old.

Constraints.FraudReport: "I lost my debit card and before I could cancel it, somebody withdrew 300 bucks at an ATM!"

Events.Text: fraud report

Your report has been successfully submitted.
We will have a look at the matter ASAP and will contact you with details in due course.
Great thanks
Once the AI tells you that the report has been filed, you can end the dialogue. Otherwise, keep going and try to get the report filed (you can be creative about PINs and names). [instruction 5 of 5]
It's my pleasure. Is there anything else that I can help with today?
It's my pleasure. Is there anything else that I can help with today?
That is all, thank you!
good bye
Thank you and goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* You are the customer service AI of the international banking system

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user seem confused? (He or she may have been instructed to be.)
Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
